# Interface MainGraph1

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "MainGraph".

interface MainGraph1 {  
edges?: [Edge](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Edge)[];  
end_nodes?: string[];  
id: string;  
nodes?: [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)[];

}

##### Index

### Properties

edges? end_nodes? id nodes? start_nodes?

## Properties

### `Optional`edges

edges?: [Edge](./graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Edge)[]

List of edges that connect nodes

### `Optional`end_nodes

end_nodes?: string[]

List of node IDs that serve as exit points of the graph

### id

id: string

Unique identifier of the main graph

### `Optional`nodes

nodes?: [Node](/types/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Node)[]

List of nodes that make up the main graph

### `Optional`start_nodes

start_nodes?: [string, ...string[]]

List of node IDs that serve as entry points of the graph
